2: rten gsum po gcig gzhon <mistake>lus//gnas</mistake> brtan rgan po <mistake>skyedgu'i</mistake> <mistake>bdag /sum</mistake> cu rtsa gnyis <mistake>mtshan</mistake> 'chang <mistake>pa //sdug</mistake> gu 'jig rten gsum na <mistake>mdges//slob</mistake> dpon 'jig <mistake>rtena</mistake> yon tan <mistake>shes//</mistake>
3: 'jig rten <mistake>slo ba</mistake> dpon 'jigs pa <mistake>med//mgon</mistake> skyob 'jig rten gsum khyab <mistake>pa//skyabs</mistake> dang <mistake>sgyob</mistake> pa bla na <mistake>med/ /nam</mistake> mkha' khyab par longs <mistake>skyod</mistake> <mistake>pa//thams</mistake> cad mkhyen pa ye shes <mistake>mtso//</mistake>
4: ma rig sgo <mistake>nga'i</mistake> sbubs 'byed <mistake>pa// srid</mistake> pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po // nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed <mistake>pa//'khor</mistake> <mistake>ka'i</mistake> rgya <mistake>m/tsho'i</mistake> pha rol <mistake>son//ye</mistake> shes dbang bskur <mistake>chod</mistake> pan <mistake>can//yang</mistake> dag rdzogs pa'i <mistake>sangs</mistake>
5: rgyas <mistake>rgyan//sdug</mistake> bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal <mistake>zhi//gsum</mistake> mtha' mtha' <mistake>yas</mistake> grol gsum <mistake>pa//srib</mistake> pa thams cad nges par <mistake>grol//mkha'</mistake> ltar mnyam pa nyid la <mistake>gnas//nyon</mistake> mongs dri ma kun
6: <mistake>as</mistake> <mistake>'das /dus</mistake> gsum dus med rtogs par <mistake>gnas//sems</mistake> can kun gyi klu chen <mistake>po //yon</mistake> tan thod can rnams kyi <mistake>thod//lhag</mistake> ma kun las rnam grol <mistake>ba//nam</mistake> mkha'i lam la rab gnas <mistake>pa//</mistake>
7: yid bzhin nor bu chen po <mistake>'chang// khyab</mistake> bdag <mistake>rin</mistake> <mistake>cshan</mistake> kun gyi <mistake>mchog /dpag</mistake> bsam shing <mistake>chan</mistake> rgyas pa ste // bum pa bzang po che ba'i <mistake>mchog /byed</mistake> bo sems can kun <mistake>don</mistake> <mistake>byed//phan</mistake> 'dogs sems
8: can mnyes gshin <mistake>pa// bzang</mistake> <mistake>gan</mistake> shes shing dus <mistake>shes</mistake> <mistake>pa//khyab</mistake> bdag dam shes dam tshig <mistake>ldan//dus</mistake> shes sems can dbang bo <mistake>shes//rnam</mistake> grol gsum la mkhas pa <mistake>po//yon</mistake> tan ldan
